/metadata.summary: Access to the Server's Capability Statement
/metadata.description: All FHIR Servers return a CapabilityStatement that describes what services they perform

/Device.summary: Manager for resources of type Device
/Device.description: The Manager for resources of type Device: provides services to manage the collection of all the Device instances

get.summary: Search all resources of type Device based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: _content
parameters.description: Search the contents of the resource's data using a fulltext search

parameters.name: _has
parameters.description: Return resources linked to by the given target

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the resource

parameters.name: _language
parameters.description: The language of the resource

parameters.name: _lastUpdated
parameters.description: Only return resources which were last updated as specified by the given range

parameters.name: _profile
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given profile

parameters.name: _security
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given security labels

parameters.name: _tag
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given tag

parameters.name: _text
parameters.description: Search the contents of the resource's narrative using a fulltext search

parameters.name: device-name
parameters.description: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Device.udi.name  or Device.type.coding.display or  Device.type.text

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Instance id from manufacturer, owner, and others

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: A location, where the resource is found

parameters.name: manufacturer
parameters.description: The manufacturer of the device

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: The model of the device

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The organization responsible for the device

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: Patient information, if the resource is affixed to a person

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: active | inactive | entered-in-error | unknown

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the device

parameters.name: udi-carrier
parameters.description: UDI Barcode (RFID or other technology) string either in HRF format or AIDC format converted to base64 string.

parameters.name: udi-di
parameters.description: The udi Device Identifier (DI)

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Network address to contact device

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/Device/{rid}.summary: Read/Write/etc resource instance of type Device
/Device/{rid}.description: Access to services to manage the state of a single resource of type Device

get.summary: Read the current state of the resource

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

put.summary: Update the current state of the resource

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/Device/{rid}/_history/{hid}.summary: Read a past version of resource instance of type Device
/Device/{rid}/_history/{hid}.description: Access a to specified previous version of a single resource of type Device

get.summary: Read a past state of the resource

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag for that version

/_history.summary: Read a past version of resource instance of all types
/_history.description: Access a previous versions of all types

get.summary: Read the past states of all resources

parameters.name: _since
parameters.description: Only include resource versions that were created at or after the given instant in time

parameters.name: _at
parameters.description: Only include resource versions that were current at some point during the time period specified in the date time value (see Search notes on date searching)

parameters.name: _list
parameters.description: Only include resource versions that are referenced in the specified list (current list references are allowed)

summary.name: _summary
summary.description: Requests the server to return a designated subset of the resource

format.name: _format
format.description: Specify alternative response formats by their MIME-types (when a client is unable acccess accept: header)

pretty.name: _pretty
pretty.description: Ask for a pretty printed response for human convenience

elements.name: _elements
elements.description: Requests the server to return a collection of elements from the resource

count.name: _count
count.description: The maximum number of search results on a page. The server is not bound to return the number requested, but cannot return more
